name: hyperhtml-wire
description: The persistent fragment like class used in hyperHTML

scripts.build: npm run esm && npm run cjs && npm run min && npm run test
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default Wire;' >> esm/index.js
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = Wire;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.min: echo "/*!(c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC*/$(uglifyjs index.js -m -c)" > min.js

author: Andrea Giammrchi
